info.task: open nested modal dialog using link
info.title: Open a nested modal dialog using a link in interaction mode

setupScript.name: openAddressAddedDialogAndFocusYourProfileLink
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' dialog followed by the 'Address Added' dialog, and sets focus on the 'your profile' link inside the second dialog

user: With focus on the 'your profile' link inside a modal dialog, open the nested 'End of the Road!' dialog.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'your profile' link inside a modal dialog, open the nested 'End of the Road!' dialog.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name 'End of the Road!' is conveyed
Description of the dialog ('You activated a fake link or button that goes nowhere! The link or button is present for demonstration purposes only.') is conveyed
Role of the focused element ('button') is conveyed
Name of the focused element ('Close') is conveyed
